mapper.insert: INSERT INTO multiplechoice (subject_name, multiplechoice_question, multiplechoice_answer) VALUES (#{subjectName}, #{multiplechoiceQuestion}, #{multiplechoiceAnswer})
mapper.select: SELECT subject_name subjectName , multiplechoice_question multiplechoiceQuestion , multiplechoice_answer multiplechoiceAnswer , update_date updateDate , create_date createDate FROM multiplechoice WHERE subject_name =#{subjectName}
